p.s: The given speech On the American Dream by Barack Obama delivered on November the 7th 2007 at Bettendorf, Iowa is about the core reasons for fighting for the American Dream.
To open with he starts by talking about his journey, about what people he has seen and he havehas learned.
Therefore Obama underlines his good impression of the americanAmerican people and talks about the values health care, education and opportunity for their kids he and his sister want.
Secondly he refers to his grandparents and their difficult story and that everyone can live a wealthy and good life if they work hard.
Then he also refers to his mother and his reason why he believes in the American Dream based on his EDIT.
Last but not least he then talks about his won experiences as a community organizer in which he personally solves social problems and unites people just like in the American Dream.
